column2: "Great job. I have concluded the investigation related to the actual conditions of Arks this time."
"Thanks to you, I can now express my research to my country."

"Oh, what's that look you have there?
Well, it's quite obvious, isn't it?
I have no intention to hide it anyway."
"Alright, since you have helped me this way, as a gift, I will answer one question from you."
"Go on, ask me whatever you want?"
"- Oh, it's nothing."
"- Who are you exactly?"
"- Who is the requester of the investigation?"

"Oh, is that it?
Well, as you should be aware, this is not something that you should know."
"Alright, this conversation ends here."
"I might have a request for you later so I'll be counting on you again."
"As you might already know, I am not an official Arks member."

"I'm also not a resident of Oracle.
I'm from a planet that has not yet been discovered by Oracle."
"Well, to put it simply, I am an infiltration agent."

"Besides me, my partners have also infiltrated in here using replicated Authentication codes with the same motives.
We are very professionals in this,"

"They should be active at planet Lilipur and Wopal now. As for me, I intend to carry on my work at the centre of Naberius from now onwards.
"

"Oh come on, take it easy.
No need to be that cautious towards me because I'm sure the Oracle administrator would have noticed me already,
"
"Despite that, the fact that I was able to carry on my research under no intervention could mean that they must surely think that I am not a big threat or anything."

"Well, that is the fact anyway.
That's that, actually."
"In this vast universe, there are many more planets and civilizations that exist and are still not yet being undiscovered by the Arks "
"And my requester is the government organization of a large country from one of those planets that you do not know."
"The name of that country is …… hmm, let's call it [Orakio Kingdom]."
"For Orakio Kingdom, we only got to know the existence of this huge space fleet, Oracle, by chance during our investigation of outer space."
"After that it is pretty straightforward as I was employed to secretly investigate the purpose and technology of this unknown fleet."
"By the way, the course taken by the Oracle fleet is the exact opposite direction of the planet where Orakio Kingdom is."

"If there's no movement from my
kingdom, it is unlikely that we would be
in contact.Perhaps for hundreds of years."

"Of course, that's assuming that ARKS
will not expand the area scope of
investigation in that direction too."

"So what we are doing is to investigate
and collect information to be sure.
It's a form of insurance for us."

"It's up to you whether you believe me
or not. Well, I think no one will believe
you even if you tell them this story."

"That's the end of my story.
See you around."

"お疲れ様。今回の調査で
一連のアークス実態調査は
一旦完了よ。"

"おかげさまで、私も大手を振って
本国に顔向けできるわ。"

"あら、何か聞きたそうな顔ね？
まぁ、当然かしら。
無理に隠すつもりもなかったし。"

"いいわ、これまでいろいろと
手伝ってくれたお礼に
一つだけ質問に答えるわ。"

"それで、貴方は
何が聞きたいのかしら？"
"・何も聞かない"
"・アリスは、何者？"
"・調査の依頼主は誰？"

"あら、そう？
まぁ知ったところで
貴方に得のある話ではないしね。"
"じゃぁ、この話はこれでおしまい。"

"また、何かお願いすることが
あるかもしれないけれど
そのときは、よろしくね。"

"気付いているかもしれないけれど
私は、正規のアークスではないわ。"

"というか、オラクルの住民ですらない。
まだ、オラクルも発見していない
惑星からやってきたの。"

"まぁ、簡単に言ってしまえば
潜入工作員といったところかしら。"

"私以外にも、何人かの仲間が同じ目的で
認証コードを偽装し、潜入しているわ。
そういうのだけは得意なのよ、私たち。"

"今は、惑星リリーパと惑星ウォパルで
活動しているはずよ。私もこれから
ナベリウス中心に活動するつもり。"

"ああ、大丈夫大丈夫。
そんなに警戒しなくても、オラクルの
管理者には気付かれてるはずだから。"

"それでも放っておかれてるってことは
大勢に影響ないと
思われているのよ、きっと。"

"まぁ実際、その通りなのだけれど。
それはそれで、しゃくよね。"

"この広大な宇宙には、アークスも
まだ知らない未知の惑星や文明が
それこそ星の数ほど存在する。"

"そんな惑星の一つにある
大きな国の政府機関が私の依頼主よ。"

"その国の名を……そうね
仮に「オラキオ王国」としましょうか。"

"そのオラキオ王国は、外宇宙の調査中に
偶然にも、この巨大宇宙船団オラクルの
存在を知ったのよ。"

"あとは簡単、その未知の船団の目的や
テクノロジーを密かに調査するために
私たちを雇ったというわけ。"

"ちなみに、今のオラクル船団の進路は
オラキオ王国のある惑星とは
全く正反対。"

"王国側から仕掛けない限り
接触する可能性はほぼ皆無ね。
数百年はないんじゃないかしら。"

"アークスが、意識的にそちらへ
調査網を広げない限りは、ね。"

"だから、私たちのやっていることは
念のための調査、みたいなもの。
保険よ、保険。"

"信じるか信じないかは、貴方次第。
まあ、誰に話してもこんな与太話
信じてもらえないでしょうね。"

"話はここまで。
また何かあればよろしくね。"
